children.text: The default language of UUI is English. Therefore, in most cases, texts are provided by UUI users. However, some components have built-in texts, such as the 'Select All' button caption in the PickerInput footer. For this case, we have an Internationalization approach.
variable, which contains all built-in texts from this package. Thus, to translate it, you need to import the
object into your project and update this object with texts in the desired language.
